desc: SOMM Blinders Game is a highly strategic, addictive, and insanely fun card game that allows anyone to learn and compete in their own blind tasting at home. Made from the makers of the award-winning SOMM Documentaries and SOMM TV.

layout.text: SOMM Blinders Game is a highly strategic, addictive, and insanely fun card game that allows anyone to learn and compete in their own blind tasting at home
